Name: Plateau Lesson for Kids: Definition & Facts
Subject: ['earthquakes', 'volcanology', 'geography', 'volcanic eruptions', 'science', 'seismology', 'geology', 'topography']
Description: Plateaus are unique landforms found on all continents. In this lesson, learn the definition of a plateau, find out how plateaus are formed, and discover major plateaus of the world.
